overview:
Bill leads engineering, quality, and system operations for Klamr. Based in San Francisco, he straddles the Pacific leading teams in Ho Chi Minh City and shouting distance from AT&T Park in San Francisco.

Bill has more years of experience than he likes to recall building and leading globally distributed teams that design, develop, and deploy high-quality software. At Sony, Bill delivered music and video recognition APIs to internal teams in the US and Japan. At Roxio, Bill was posted to Shanghai to work with local leadership and team (275+ engineers and QA) to improve product development efficiency and innovation. He has 3 patents, and received 3 degrees in Electrical Engineering from MIT (he believes in doing things in 3s).

When heâ€™s not on an airplane or on Skype, he rides centuries and does triathlons (again with the 3s), which would shock his high school gym teacher.
